short_summary: Supply and delivery of a Raman Microscope
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a Raman Microscope
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Information

* **Title:** 39903-230110 Raman Microscope
* **Reference Number:** WS3764495063-Doc3764557677
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3764495063

## Tender Schedule

* **Publication Date:** December 5, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 23, 2022 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** [To be confirmed]

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** [See explanation below]*

## Location

* **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
* **Regions of Delivery:** Toronto

## Contracting Entity

* **Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User

* **Name:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* **Address:** 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Name:** Berends, Robert (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Note:** No phone or fax number is provided

## Attachment and Notice Details

* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14729140?extsite=MTQ3MjkxNDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachment:** None provided

## Tender Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking the provision and delivery of a Raman Microscope by March 31, 2023. The procurement process is open to all qualified bidders and will be awarded based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, and several others. Please note that full details of these agreements can be found in the provided notice
